name: SLIME MOLD SIMULATOR: ATTACK OF THE BLOB
name_original: SLIME MOLD SIMULATOR: ATTACK OF THE BLOB
description:
SLIME MOLD SIMULATOR: ATTACK OF THE BLOB is an adventure game developed by dumpster_foot. It came out on 31-10-2022.
SLIME MOLD SIMULATOR: ATTACK OF THE BLOB is available on Web. The game is sold via itch.io.
